testcase.classname: As an administrator, I want to access the loan details information of a user with a specified ID via API connection.
testcase.name: When a valid GET request with appropriate authorization credentials and correct data (id)

failure.message: status code: 404, reason phrase: Not Found

testcase.failure:
Given The API user sets "api/loans/details/31" path parameters..............passed And The API user records the response from the api loans details endpoint with valid authorization information.failed Then The API user verifies that the status code is 200......................skipped And The API user verifies that the remark information in the response body is "success".skipped
